validation.email: Please enter a valid email address.

platformSettings.title: Platform Settings
platformSettings.description: Manage global settings for the ResumeMatch AI platform.

validation.platformNameMin: Platform name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMin: Max job posting days must be at least 1.
validation.maxJobPostingDaysMax: Max job posting days cannot exceed 365.
validation.maxResumesMin: Max resume uploads must be at least 1.
validation.sessionTimeoutMin: Session timeout must be at least 5 minutes.
validation.sessionTimeoutMax: Session timeout cannot exceed 1440 minutes (24 hours).
validation.maxEventRegistrationsMin: Max event registrations must be at least 1.
validation.pointsForAffiliateMin: Points for affiliate signup must be non-negative.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: Platform settings have been successfully updated.

platformName.label: Platform Name
platformName.description: The name displayed across the platform.

maintenanceMode.label: Maintenance Mode
maintenanceMode.description: Enable to take the platform offline for users.

defaultProfileVisibility.label: Default Profile Visibility
defaultProfileVisibility.description: Set the default visibility for new user profiles.

maxResumesPerUser.label: Max Resume Uploads per User
maxResumesPerUser.description: Limit for resume profiles a user can create/upload.

defaultTheme.label: Default Theme
defaultTheme.description: Set the default theme for new users.

enablePublicProfilePages.label: Enable Public Profile Pages
enablePublicProfilePages.description: Allow users to have publicly accessible profile URLs.

sessionTimeoutMinutes.label: Session Timeout (Minutes)
sessionTimeoutMinutes.description: Inactive user sessions will expire after this duration.

globalAnnouncement.label: Global Announcement Bar Text
globalAnnouncement.description: Text displayed in a banner across the platform (leave empty to hide).
globalAnnouncement.placeholder: e.g., New features launched! Check out...

autoModeratePosts.label: Enable AI Auto-Moderation for Posts
autoModeratePosts.description: If enabled, AI will attempt to flag potentially inappropriate content.

maxJobPostingDays.label: Max Job Posting Duration (Days)
maxJobPostingDays.description: How long job posts remain active by default.

xpForLogin.label: XP for Daily Login
xpForLogin.description: Points awarded for daily active use.

xpForNewPost.label: XP for New Community Post
xpForNewPost.description: Points awarded for creating a post.

pointsForAffiliateSignup.label: Points for Successful Affiliate Signup
pointsForAffiliateSignup.description: Points awarded to referrer when an affiliate signup is completed.

defaultAppointmentCost.label: Default Cost for Booking Alumni Appointment (Coins)

maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.label: Max Event Registrations per User
maxEventRegistrationsPerUser.description: Limit for active event registrations per user.

tenantCustomization.description: Control what aspects tenants can customize for their instance.

allowTenantCustomBranding.label: Allow Tenants to Customize Branding
allowTenantCustomBranding.description: If enabled, tenant managers can upload logos and set theme colors.

allowTenantEmailCustomization.label: Allow Tenants to Customize Email Templates
allowTenantEmailCustomization.description: If enabled, tenant managers can modify certain outgoing email templates.

tenantManagement.title: Tenant Management
tenantManagement.description: Oversee and manage all organizational tenants on the platform.
tenantManagement.noTenantsFound: No tenants have been onboarded yet. Click 'Create New Tenant' to get started.
tenantManagement.editActionMock: Edit action for tenant {tenantId} is a mock.
tenantManagement.deleteActionToast: Tenant {tenantId} and associated data would be removed (mock).

errorPage.title: Something Went Wrong
errorPage.description: We're sorry, but an unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the issue persists.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to view this page or perform this action.

formLabels.allowPublicSignup: Allow Public Signup to this Tenant

validation.tenantNameMin: Tenant name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.invalidUrl: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com/image.png).
validation.invalidColor: Invalid color format. Use HEX (e.g., #RRGGBB) or HSL (e.g., hsl(H S% L%)).
validation.adminEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email for the admin user.
validation.adminNameRequired: Admin user's full name is required.
validation.adminPasswordMin: Admin password must be at least 8 characters.

announcementsAdmin.title: Announcements Management
announcementsAdmin.noAnnouncementsTenant: No announcements found for your tenant.

permissionDeniedEdit.title: Permission Denied
permissionDeniedEdit.description: You can only edit announcements you created for your tenant or platform-wide announcements if you are an admin.

permissionDeniedDelete.title: Permission Denied
permissionDeniedDelete.description: You can only delete announcements you created for your tenant or platform-wide announcements if you are an admin.

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 5 characters.
validation.contentMin: Content must be at least 10 characters.

contentModeration.title: Content Moderation
contentModeration.descriptionPlatform: Review and manage flagged content from the community feed across all tenants.
contentModeration.descriptionTenant: Review and manage flagged content from your tenant's ({tenantId}) community feed.
contentModeration.noFlaggedPostsPlatform: No posts are currently flagged across the platform.
contentModeration.noFlaggedPostsTenant: No posts are currently flagged for your tenant.

postApproved.title: Post Approved
postApproved.description: The post is now visible on the feed.

postRemoved.title: Post Removed
postRemoved.description: The post has been removed from the feed.

blogSettingsAdmin.title: AI Blog Settings
blogSettingsAdmin.description: Configure automated blog post generation and manage content settings.
blogSettingsAdmin.generationIntervalHelp: How often the AI should attempt to generate a new blog post.
blogSettingsAdmin.topicsPlaceholder: e.g., Career Development, Job Search Tips, Resume Writing, Networking
blogSettingsAdmin.topicsHelp: The AI will pick from these topics when generating posts.
blogSettingsAdmin.selectTopicManualPlaceholder: Choose a topic from your list
blogSettingsAdmin.customTopicPlaceholder: Or enter a custom topic here
blogSettingsAdmin.importantNoteContent: AI-generated content should always be reviewed and edited by a human before publishing to ensure quality, accuracy, and alignment with your brand voice. Generated posts are added to the main blog and can be managed there.

settingsSaved.title: Settings Saved
settingsSaved.description: AI blog generation settings have been updated.

noTopicSelected.title: No Topic Selected
noTopicSelected.description: Please select or enter a topic to generate a blog post.

postGenerated.title: Blog Post Generated!
postGenerated.description: New post '{title}' created. Please review and publish from the main blog page.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: Could not generate blog post. Please try again or check AI service status.

validation.intervalMin: Interval must be at least 1 hour.
validation.topicsRequired: At least one topic is required.

featureRequests.pageDescription: Share your ideas for new features or improvements. Vote on existing suggestions.
featureRequests.dialogDescriptionCreate: We'd love to hear your ideas! Clearly describe the feature or improvement you'd like to see.
featureRequests.dialogDescriptionEdit: Update the details of your suggestion.
featureRequests.formTitlePlaceholder: e.g., Add dark mode for dashboard
featureRequests.formDescriptionPlaceholder: Explain the problem this feature solves, how it might work, and its benefits.
featureRequests.noRequestsDescription: Be the first to suggest a feature or improvement for ResumeMatch AI!

validation.titleMin: Title must be at least 5 characters.
validation.descriptionMin: Description must be at least 10 characters.

toastSuggestionSubmitted.title: Suggestion Submitted!
toastSuggestionSubmitted.description: Thank you for your feedback. Your suggestion has been recorded.

toastSuggestionUpdated.title: Suggestion Updated
toastSuggestionUpdated.description: Your suggestion has been successfully updated.

toastCannotEdit.title: Cannot Edit Suggestion
toastCannotEdit.description: You can only edit your own pending suggestions. Admins can edit any.

toastViewDetailsMock.title: View Details (Mock)
toastViewDetailsMock.description: Viewing details for '{title}'. Full detail page not yet implemented.

referrals.pageDescription: Share ResumeMatch AI with your friends and earn rewards!
referrals.yourReferralCardDescription: Use this code or link to invite friends. Earn rewards when they sign up and engage!
referrals.statsCardDescription: Track how many friends you've invited and your rewards.
referrals.rewardsInfo: Rewards are typically X Coins or Y XP per successful signup. Terms apply.
referrals.historyCardDescription: See a log of your past referrals and their status.
referrals.noHistory: You haven't referred anyone yet. Start sharing to earn rewards!
referrals.howItWorksStep1: 1. Share your unique referral code or link with friends and colleagues.
referrals.howItWorksStep2: 2. When they sign up using your code/link, their registration is attributed to you.
referrals.howItWorksStep3: 3. Once they complete certain actions (e.g., verify email, complete profile), you earn rewards!
referrals.howItWorksStep4: 4. Track your referrals and rewards here. Payouts (if applicable) are processed monthly.

toastShareAPINotSupported.title: Link Copied
toastShareAPINotSupported.description: Share API not supported. Referral link copied to clipboard instead.
